parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The streaming domain name or names.

Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

>  If you do not set this parameter, the data of the hour following the specified start time is returned.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description:
The name of the Internet service provider (ISP).

To query ISPs, call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description:
The name of the region in which you want to query data.

To query regions, call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
